Yea, I know it's Saturday night, but I thought I'd start early.

This week we are evaluating Fire Elementals and Giant Skeletons.

Here's a rehash of the topics for the coming weeks.

1)skeletons and ghosts

2)clerics and archmages

3)proposed new character classes - not promotions or hybrids/dual   
class - each proposed new character gets 3 days before I move on 
unless discussion picks up.  I know of at least one new proposed 
character class for this category.

4)orc captains

5)more proposed new character class - promotions of existing classes 
only - each proposed new character gets 3 days before I move on unless 
 discussion picks up.  I know of at least 3 proposed new promoted 
character classes for this category.

6)Game Issues of Health and Mana - yep, we will be talking about 
health and mana of characters for a week.  Somehow, it will be tied to 
 Hybrid/dual class discussion.

7)3 weeks on hybrid/dual class - we'll just have to wait and see why I 
want to handle this in 3 parts.

8)Game Issues of Speed and Teleporters

9)Game Issues of Generators
